channel.title: Need help with somethings
channel.description:
i have a server that is deltascape based i have a couple questions that need to be answered!
1. How do I change the items that a player starts with? 2. How do i move objects like the altar of guthix around? 3. How do i change the number of waves fight caves have? 4. HOW DO I CHANGE THE MAX HIT OF MY WEAPONS? I.E. my ags can only hit up to 30? how do i make it so it can hit like 75's
PLease take the time to answer! please answer with detail so i can understand! lol :)
thanks

item.title: Need help with somethings
item.dc:creator: @loggedout loggedout
item.description:
@loggedout wrote:

[quote=“mister G, post:1, topic:250113”]1. How do I change the items that a player starts with?
client.java (crtl f) starter
2. How do i move objects like the altar of guthix around?
client.java (crtl f) 410 then move coords
3. How do i change the number of waves fight caves have?
hmm this i dont no,
4. HOW DO I CHANGE THE MAX HIT OF MY WEAPONS? I.E. my ags can only hit up to 30? how do i make it so it can hit like 75’s hmm,
i think this is in client.java or weaponshandler either 1 search the weapon id, example whip 4141 and then edit the hitdif[/quote]

Read full topic

item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

  • Initialize method
  • NewObjects method
  • Depends what type of source you’re using
  • Edit the item bonuses in the item.cfg file
